page.title: 01Summary of the Area.
page.content: Most of the area consists of mountains with housing communities in the valleys between. Most of the mountains are covered by forestry though a large part is open grazing land. The largest community is{Cwmavon which is part of the Borough of{Afan containing the steel town of{Port {Talbot.}Part of the smaller community of {Pontrhydyfen,}known as{Oakwood,}is separated from the rest of the village by the{River Afan.}This river flows through the area and at Pontrhydyfen, receives water from the{Pelenna River. In addition to these housing communities there are several{farms scattered over the mountain sides. Pontrhydyfen is probably most well known as the birthplace of the actor, Richard Burton, who died in 1984.
